descripcion:
This formula is excellent for foliar application on vegetables, row crops, trees, and turf grass. High urea and very good solubility make this an especially effective foliar fertilizer. Includes micronutrients.

DERIVED FROM: Potassium Nitrate, Urea, Mono Ammonium Phosphate, Iron EDDHA, Iron EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367

POTENTIAL BASICITY: 1100 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.
